name: 村庄-The Village
description:
"The Village" is a micro thriller of suspense works. This work is a mixture of terror, reasoning, suspense and other mixed elements, which is worth playing.

Game Introduction
In this work, you play a country doctor who just graduated from university. What seems to be a quiet and peaceful village is a mystery.

The content of the game is real and intense, with a strong sense of bringing in! Can you survive in this village under many crises? The true story behind the village is waiting for you to discover!

Features
"Strong logic": Players need to be careful with every choice after reasoning. If they are not careful, they may die.

"Brilliant characterization": The character portrayal of the work is excellent. Everyone has his or her own secret

"Multiple outcomes experience": High freedom of choice, there are a variety of different routes available, each with a unique landscape.
